reviews.text: Chicken wings is the star here, all other food is just as per normal and what it supposed to taste like. Happy hour ( HH ) beers on tap is reasonably priced. There is darts and pool here for your gathering to be more eventful.

On the advice of a buddy, decided to come here with my wife on a Friday night! And make no mistake! An amazing bar, or pub, where you feel at home from the first second! Fantastic atmosphere, luxurious choice of drinks, incredible music from the 80's and 90's, classic soft rock and excellent pop.  Two floors of pleasant noise and music, darts! It turns out that the regular guests even organized a challenge, who will drink beer faster!
Cool! The martini cocktails were excellent, the mini-burgers were very tasty, the whiskey was strong and timely! Thank you so much to the Ice Cold Beer team for a great job and great mood! We will come to your place more often!
A place for wide variety of beer. Here from my 20s to now 50s. Good chill vibe whenever I don't feel like clubbing. Great hospitality and service.

Ice Cold Beer lives up to its name! A great spot for casual drinks and a lively atmosphere. The beer selection is solid, and the food, while simple, hits the spot. Expect a bustling crowd, especially on weekends. Service is friendly and efficient. Perfect for a no-fuss night out with friends.
Great little bar off orchard road. Great selection of beer. Lovely staff and location.
